ygData.subject: RE: A trade skill question for the gallery.
ygData.msgSnippet: It becomes trivial in the 60 s I think. ... From: Kyle Sibbald [mailto:ksibbald@execpc.com] Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 4:55 PM To: eqbards@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
It becomes trivial in the 60's I think.

-----Original Message-----
From: Kyle Sibbald [mailto:ksibbald@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 05, 1999 4:55 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] A trade skill question for the gallery.


From: "Kyle Sibbald" <ksibbald@...>

Cured silk requires a decent brewing skill (70 I've heard) for the
Heady
Kiola to be self sufficient. It can, of course, be bought from felow
brewers...

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)

8)question about the new cured silk. Is the triviality level the same
8)as raw silk/patchwork or is this something new to use instead of the
8)platinum eating studded armor?
8)

8)ask at right now.
8)
